tool.name: DCA Convergence Tool
tool.command: #set $gpu_str = "--nv" if $gpu else "" #set $sif_name = "dca_0_2_0.sif" if $gpu else "dca_cpu_0_1_0.sif" #set $sif_image = "summit-singularity:0.2.0" if $gpu else "summit-singularity-cpu:0.1.0" #set $portal = $input_mode.input_folder if $input_mode.input_mode_folder else "$(pwd)/portal" module purge && module load DefApps && module load gcc/9.1.0 && mkdir -p $portal && source /gpfs/alpine/stf007/world-shared/containers/utils/requiredmpilibs.source && ( [ -e \${_GALAXY_JOB_DIR}/../containers/$sif_name ] || singularity pull --disable-cache --dir \${_GALAXY_JOB_DIR}/../containers $sif_name oras://code.ornl.gov:4567/ndip/tool-sources/dca/dca-main/$sif_image ) && \${GALAXY_COMMAND_PREFIX} singularity exec $gpu_str --bind $portal:/portal --bind $input:/input/input_file.json --pwd /portal \${_GALAXY_JOB_DIR}/../containers/$sif_name /dca/main_dca /input/input_file.json &> $output && chmod g+rwX -R $portal/conv.bp
tool.help: A tool to run DCA convergence.
